interests.name: Local Market
interests.description: Local market where you can purchase local products and try the local food
interests.review: Take your Pepto Bismol before you go.

interests.name: Snooty Cafe
interests.description: Subject yourself to disdain and outright hostility from the wait staff when you struggle to order some coffee in French
interests.review: Ordered "french roast", got served a whole roasted pig. Oops
